label: Visual Studio Ultimate 2013 Update 5 with Azure Tools 2.9 on Windows Server 2012 R2
displayName: Visual Studio Ultimate 2013 Update 5 with Azure Tools 2.9 on Windows Server 2012 R2
description:
This image provides Visual Studio Ultimate 2013 Update 5 with Azure Tools 2.9 on Windows Server 2012 R2.  Visual Studio Ultimate represents the very best that Visual Studio has to offer. Created for enterprise-class development, it helps your team handle demanding requirements like high availability, performance, scale, and complexity. 

This image was created from the latest bits available on 3/8/2017.

The Visual Studio software is preinstalled in this VM, but you must acquire a Visual Studio subscription separately which allows you to sign in to and run Visual Studio on this VM.

links.label: Visual Studio subscribers Azure benefit details
